newsitem.title: USA: Northern States Minn. coal unit off line.
newsitem.headline: Northern States Minn. coal unit off line.

text.p: Northern States Power Co's 169 megawatt (MW) High Bridge coal-fired unit 6 was shut down Thursday to repair a boiler tube leak, the company said in a statement.
Northern States officials were not available to comment on a possible restart date for the unit.
Number 6 is one of two coal units at the High Bridge plant in St. Paul, Minn. The plant has a total capacity of 262 MW.
Northern States 176 MW Black Dog coal unit 4 near Minneapolis was also shut Aug 21 for repairs, and is expected to return to service near the end of the month.
-- Chris Reese, New York Power Desk 212-859-1627
